title: One Young Person's Perspective On Gender
teaser: Youth Radio commentator Mikey Prismitch says young people understand more inventively than older Americans.
contentencoded:
It was revealed this week that the newest issue of Vanity Fair magazine features a 22-page cover story with Caitlyn Jenner, the Olympic decathlete formerly known as Bruce Jenner.

Jenner’s story is sparking a national conversation about our evolving understanding of gender. It’s an issue that Youth Radio commentator Mikey Prismitch says young people understand more inventively than older Americans.

  • Read more via Youth Radio

[Youtube]

Reporter

  • Mikey Prismitch, contributor to Youth Radio.
